p: Figure 1 depicts a mammary histological section of postnatal rats. The mammary acinus of the arginine group was more regular and consistent as well as relatively larger in sectional area while the control group was not uniform in size and relatively small in sectional area with partial incomplete development. By measuring and calculating the sectional acinar area of the two groups, we observed that sectional acinus area with dietary arginine was significantly larger than the control ( p < 0.001) ( Figure 2).
